z


  OOC: (Soulstice) Lynxiz is and Termitron was (he's flying now) at 
  =
the top of a mountain. The reason that I asked if the Radicons were 
  goin=
g to attack is because Termitron and Lynxiz might have been 
  able to see =
them coming from a distance. Lynxiz was bird 
  watching and absorbing the =
beautiful surroundings, while Termitron 
  was scouting around the Chivitro=
n base. I don't know if Train Wreck 
  could run Termitron over from where =
he (Termitron) is. =3D)

  OOC: (WingedWarrior) Where did Starstomp's aster=
oid land?

  0=3D=3D0 Lynxiz 0=3D=3D0

  Lynxiz looks up from her brief soj=
ourn and notices a disturbance in 
  the calm around her. She quickly pulls=
 up her binoculars, and 
  looks downward around her on the mountain peak. =
She initiailly 
  doesn't find anything, but the an out of place site catch=
es her 
  attention, a train speeding towards the base. She hisses, "I know=
 
  him from the last fight." She opens a commlink to the Chivitrons, 
  "C=
hivitrons, your base has incomings, prepare for an attack." She 
  pulls ou=
t her disk launcher, cursing the fact that it is a slower fire 
  weapon. S=
he fires four timed (4 secs upon impact) explosive disks 
  ahead of the in=
coming train. Knowing that her disks would likely 
  serve only as a distra=
ction, she transforms, "Lynxiz, Beast Mode!" 
  and starts down the mountai=
n back to the Chivitron base.
